about_the_game:
It is definitely known that the content of the Quran is not changed and cannot be changed, it is sent by Allah as a healing and mercy to people. But except the wrongdoers! In the lights of this information, this application has been developed to help transmit this miraculous book, which was sent to guide people in divine search, to people through virtual reality.

The Quran was begun to be revealed to the Islamic prophet Muhammad(SAV) in the Hira Cave on Mount Nur in Mecca on the Night of Power of Ramadan in 610. Since the Quran was completed with the pass away of the Prophet Muhammad(SAV), it was not collected while he was alive, but preserved by memorization. One of the oldest examples of the Quran, which was later turned into a book, is currently on display at the Topkapı Palace in Istanbul.

It is definitely known that the content of the Quran is not changed and cannot be changed, it is sent by Allah as a healing and mercy to people. But except the wrongdoers!

In the lights of this information, this application has been developed to help transmit this miraculous book, which was sent to guide people in divine search, to people through virtual reality.

In the following years, we will continue to work with great determination to ensure that the entire book is transferred to virtual reality environment and that all humanity can benefit from it.

Srio İnc.
detailed_description:
It is definitely known that the content of the Quran is not changed and cannot be changed, it is sent by Allah as a healing and mercy to people. But except the wrongdoers! In the lights of this information, this application has been developed to help transmit this miraculous book, which was sent to guide people in divine search, to people through virtual reality.

The Quran was begun to be revealed to the Islamic prophet Muhammad(SAV) in the Hira Cave on Mount Nur in Mecca on the Night of Power of Ramadan in 610. Since the Quran was completed with the pass away of the Prophet Muhammad(SAV), it was not collected while he was alive, but preserved by memorization. One of the oldest examples of the Quran, which was later turned into a book, is currently on display at the Topkapı Palace in Istanbul.

It is definitely known that the content of the Quran is not changed and cannot be changed, it is sent by Allah as a healing and mercy to people. But except the wrongdoers!

In the lights of this information, this application has been developed to help transmit this miraculous book, which was sent to guide people in divine search, to people through virtual reality.

In the following years, we will continue to work with great determination to ensure that the entire book is transferred to virtual reality environment and that all humanity can benefit from it.

Srio İnc.
name: HOLY QURAN VR EXPERİENCE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit İşlemci Ve işletim sistemi gerektirir.
  • Processor: İntel Core i5- 4590 (AMD FX 8350)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
